wikipedia_page.main: Eric Cross (31 May 1902 in London – 1 March 2004 in Middlesex) was an English cinematographer.

response: Hunted (U.S. The Stranger In Between) is a black-and-white British film directed by Charles Crichton and released in 1952.  Hunted is a crime drama in the form of a chase film, starring Dirk Bogarde, and written by Jack Whittingham and Michael McCarthy. It was produced by Julian Wintle and edited by Gordon Hales and Geoffrey Muller, with cinematography by Eric Cross and music by Hubert Clifford.
